name: Fishing With Dad (pickledinink)
description:
A short Browser Game developed for the 'A Game by Its Cover Jam' 2021, and inspired by Zach Poley's "Fishing With Dad' Famicase 2021 entry. 

Enjoy a quiet day at Goosepebble Pond with your Dad and dog, Patsy. 

Drawn and Animated in Procreate and featuring the following musics:

Dreaming (Elevator 9) by Stevia Sphere (Game Screen Song)

Woods by Oak Studios (Dad Joke Marathon)

 Two Moons Bobby Richards (Flying Pufferfish)

More of my art at sarahoak.com

More of my silly animations https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHJvpU3y52I2d3w0PLyko9g
